level.appledrmod.antiappledr.appledrness: %s: Sacré bleu! Your Appledrness is as low as %s. How did you become so despicable? This is nefarious!
level.appledrmod.appledrenemy.appledrnes: %s: WHAT?! Your Appledrness is %s. Why? How?
level.appledrmod.appledrhater.appledrnes: %s: Your Appledrness is %s. That is rather concerning. It almost seems like you hate AppleDr!
level.appledrmod.appledrdisliker.appledr: %s: Your Appledrness is %s. It's slightly bad, but don't worry — I believe you can still get back to normal!
level.appledrmod.sprout.appledrness: %s: Your Appledrness is %s. You should work to become the Appledrmaster!
level.appledrmod.appledrliker.appledrnes: %s: Your Appledrness is %s. I'm starting to like you!
level.appledrmod.appledrfriend.appledrne: %s: Wow, you truly exceeded my expectations. %s Appledrness! That is so Appledrcool!
level.appledrmod.appledrmaster.appledrne: %s: My my! Oh la la. You are the crème de la crème of Appledrness. You have %s Appledrness! You are truly Appledrtastic!
level.appledrmod.appledr.appledrness: %s: I cannot believe it. %s Appledrness! WOW! You are a super player!!
item.appledrmod.apple_greathelm.desc: An apple a day keeps the doctor away!
item.appledrmod.legacy_apple_greathelm.d: I miss the old Apple Doctor!
